messages.subject: Filmography complete!
messages.msgSnippet: yes the Filmography is complete and I have some of the titles links to posters/dvd covers and commentary, some of which I ve taken from the message board, Phil
messages.messageBody:
yes the Filmography is complete and I have some of the titles links to
posters/dvd covers and commentary, some of which I've taken from the
message board, Phil & Sec if you don't wish me to use your comments or
would like to make changes let me know

And remember people you too can add comment to any of our anime/film/tv
sections or whatever!

--
Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net
